analyzed: dge ba'i chos rjes su dran pa rnams 'phel ba bsam nas kyang 'di'i bde ba rnams kyang 'phel lo //

analyzed: bde bar gyur pa rnams kyi yang stobs 'phel bar 'gyur ro //

original: chos bdun 'phel ba rnams ni /
analyzed: chos bdun 'phel ba rnams ni /

analyzed: bde bas mtshan mo 'da' bar byed la nyal ba na yang mtshan mo lus sgom pa dang / sems kyang sgom par 'gyur ro //

original: de ltar dus rnams dran pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar dus rnams dran pa yin no //

original: dge slong dag /

analyzed: 'di na dge slong gis mig btsums pa dang phye ba rtogs par byed de /

translated: Together with the momentary closing of the eyes, he obtains whatever time has passed, and the mind and mental factors that accompany that

original: dus mi ring ba na zhig cing rul bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dus mi ring ba na zhig cing rul bar 'gyur ba'o //

translated: What is the time when these things cease and arise in sequence?

original: rgas pas zad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgas pas zad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The time of youth is exhausted by old age.üîΩThe time of health is exhausted by sickness.üîΩThe time of life is exhausted by death.

original: gang skye bo thams cad kyis kyang bzlog par bya ba'i thabs med pa'i 'chi bdag gson pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pas shin tu myur zhing mgyogs par 'bab pas srid pa gzhan du bdag 'gag par 'gyur ro //

translated: The time of life is exhausted by death, which is very swift and fast-moving, destroying all living beings, and cannot be averted by any living being.

original: bdag bag chags su gyur pa thams cad kyi gson pa 'di ni /
analyzed: bdag bag chags su gyur pa thams cad kyi gson pa 'di ni /
translated: This life of mine, which is subject to all kinds of conditioning,

analyzed: shin tu myur bar 'jug pa'i phyir na rgyu med par 'chi ma 'byung ngo //

original: dper na / mar mer gnas par gyur pa'i mes snum rnams 'thung bar byed do //
analyzed: dper na / mar mer gnas par gyur pa'i mes snum rnams 'thung bar byed do //

original: de kho na bzhin du zhen pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i bdag rnams kyis kyang snum 'dra ba'i tshe 'thung bar byed pa 'di dge slong dag gis bsam par bya'o //

translated: In the same way, monks, you should consider that the self, which is of the nature of attachment, drinks the oil-like life.üîΩ

analyzed: nges par legs pa la rab tu brtson par bya'o // de ltar yang nang gi bdag nyid dngos po 'di rnams ni /
translated: Monks, you should reflect on this, and strive for the highest good.üîΩIn this way, these inner entities are destroyed by four factors that lead to their destruction.

original: rab tu nyams par byed pa'i chos bzhis zad par byed pa yin pa de bzhin du phyi rol gyi 'dus byas kyi dngos po rnams thams cad kyang bzhis 'joms par byed de /

original: ri dang / nags dang / chu klung dang / grong khyer dang / grong dang / grong rdal dang / sman gyi ljongs dang / skyid mos tshal rnams mi'i 'gro bas bsdus pa rnams dang / lha'i 'jig rten gyi yang ste /
analyzed: ri dang / nags dang / chu klung dang / grong khyer dang / grong dang / grong rdal dang / sman gyi ljongs dang / skyid mos tshal rnams mi'i 'gro bas bsdus pa rnams dang / lha'i 'jig rten gyi yang ste /

original: @204a *// 'joms zhing zad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @204a *// 'joms zhing zad par 'gyur ro //
translated: They are destroyed and perish.

original: nags dang / nye pa'i nags dang / rdzing bu dang / ljon shing gi nags rnams kyang lha rnams thams cad bag med par spyod pas nyams shing nyams par yang 'gyur ro //

translated: The forests, parks, ponds, and groves will all be destroyed by the gods‚Äô careless behavior.

analyzed: de dag rnams thams cad med pas yang dang yang du dmyal ba dang / yi dvags dang / dud 'gro rnams su skye'o //
translated: When they are gone, they will be reborn again and again as hell beings, starving spirits, and animals.

analyzed: gcig tu nges pa'i blos dran pa brtan pa /

translated: With undistracted mindfulness,üîΩhe will realize the truth of suchness.

analyzed: dge slong de ni /

analyzed: 'di yin no //

analyzed: dge slong des dus thams cad nyid du dus kyi rjes su rtogs pa'i dran pa yin no; ;de ltar na dge slong dus kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i dran pa can yin no //
